reviewText: I was very pleased with the condition and quality of this product! I had been searching for this DVD for a long time and was ecstatic at finding it on Amazon.com. It arrived in pristine condition, as if I had gone to Budapest and bought it in a store! I would definitely buy again from this supplier!

This was indeed a performance of the rock opera I wanted, but not the performance I thought it was going to be. Maybe I didn't pay attention to the details, or maybe they were not given. I assumed the only film version was the first one from the 1980s. This one was from 2002. The music was almost as good, but the singing was generally not up to the original and the staging was odd.Istvan, a Kiraly Hungarian Rockopera Dalszöveg: Bródy János Zene: Szörényi Levente
